title: Grow Tank
content: Join the battle with your own tank and destroy other tanks to grow your EX.

title: Stake to tank
content: Each tank has daily energy used to play the game. Each tank offer staking opportunity based on its level and Staking make energy recover power for tank.
A Way how non-players earn money and gamers also profit from staking
Player-investor reciprocity: Only players can offer staking opportunities and investors can give players the ability to recover energy, allowing them to grow their tanks faster.

title: Factory operation
content: Produce game assets such as energy potions, health potions, and building assets and sell in market.

title: Own castles and villages
content: Build castles and villages and get game tokens
